complex_synthesis.description: Complex multi-document synthesis and integration tasks

chain_of_thought.description: Step-by-step reasoning chains with explicit logical progression
chain_of_thought.reasoning_focus: sequential logic, step clarity, causal reasoning

verification_loops.description: Self-checking and verification reasoning with error detection

mathematical_reasoning.description: Mathematical and logical reasoning with precise calculations

multi_hop_inference.description: Multi-source inference requiring connections across information sources
multi_hop_inference.reasoning_focus: cross-source connections, pattern recognition, evidence synthesis

scaffolded_reasoning.description: Structured reasoning frameworks with systematic analysis templates
scaffolded_reasoning.reasoning_focus: systematic analysis, structured frameworks, methodical evaluation

backward_reasoning.description: Reverse reasoning from conclusions to evidence and causes
backward_reasoning.reasoning_focus: reverse engineering, conclusion tracing, causal backtracking

text_continuation.description: Basic text continuation and completion tasks
text_continuation.reasoning_focus: natural language flow, context understanding, style consistency

pattern_completion.reasoning_focus: pattern recognition, logical sequences, structural understanding

style_mimicry.description: Style mimicking and adaptation across different writing formats
style_mimicry.reasoning_focus: style adaptation, tone matching, format consistency

context_coherence.description: Context maintenance and coherence over extended passages
context_coherence.reasoning_focus: context tracking, consistency maintenance, detail coherence

code_reasoning.description: Advanced software engineering analysis including debugging, architecture evaluation, and optimization
code_reasoning.reasoning_focus: code comprehension, debugging logic, architectural analysis, performance optimization

causal_reasoning.description: Multi-layer causation analysis with counterfactual reasoning and complex cause-effect chains
causal_reasoning.reasoning_focus: causation analysis, counterfactual scenarios, causal chain reconstruction, intervention effects

long_context_reasoning.description: Analysis and synthesis across 30K+ token contexts with cross-document reasoning
long_context_reasoning.reasoning_focus: long-range context tracking, cross-document synthesis, information integration across large texts

strategic_reasoning.description: Multi-domain strategic planning with resource optimization and trade-off analysis
strategic_reasoning.reasoning_focus: strategic planning, resource allocation, multi-objective optimization, trade-off analysis

meta_reasoning.description: Reasoning about reasoning processes, strategy analysis, and cognitive reflection
meta_reasoning.reasoning_focus: metacognitive analysis, reasoning strategy evaluation, cognitive process reflection

systems_reasoning.description: Complex system dynamics analysis with emergent behavior prediction and feedback loops
systems_reasoning.reasoning_focus: systems thinking, emergent behavior analysis, feedback loop identification, dynamic systems

scientific_reasoning.description: Advanced scientific methodology with hypothesis generation and experimental design
scientific_reasoning.reasoning_focus: scientific method, hypothesis formation, experimental design, data interpretation

adversarial_reasoning.description: Sophisticated bias detection, argument deconstruction, and critical analysis of flawed reasoning
adversarial_reasoning.reasoning_focus: bias detection, argument analysis, logical fallacy identification, critical evaluation
